overview:
Nuraizah Shamsul Baharin is the Managing Director of Madcat World Sdn. Bhd. Madcat World enables mobility and productivity services and develops lifestyle applications for mobile and Internet services with Islamic content as their niche market. She graduated as an Electrical Engineer from the University of Michigan and started her career as a Product Engineer with Motorola Malaysia working in Malaysia, Germany and Scotland. She then joined Sapura Nokia Software in 2000 as an R&D Engineer and started diversifying her skills by going into sales and marketing. In 2006, she started CWorks Mobile and in July 2010, she setup Madcat World. In Apr 2011, Madcat World took over the business entity of CWorks Mobile.
In her free time, Nuraizah is a mentor with Cradle Investment Program (CIP) Catalyst and Treasurer for the Womenâ€™s Entrepreneur Network Association (WENA.)
